title: FTX discount sale of $1.9 billion in Solana faces creditor fury
description:
FTX creditors have strongly disapproved of the bankrupt crypto exchange’s decision to sell its Solana holdings at a significant discount to crypto venture firms. Earlier today, reports revealed that FTX offloaded as much as 30 million SOL at a rate of $64 each to VC firms like Pantera Capital and Galaxy Trading. The move is […]

The post FTX discount sale of $1.9 billion in Solana faces creditor fury appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Analyst Who Nailed Bitcoin’s 2018 Bear Market Bottom Predicts Incoming Rally for Ethereum Rival $NEAR
description: A top cryptocurrency strategist who has gained a large following on social media after accurately calling Bitcoin’s 2018 bear market bottom above $3,000 has recently suggested that the price of smart contract platform NER Protocol ($NEAR) could soon explode upward to around $10.5. The pseudonymous trader Bluntz Capital shared with their over 250,000 followers a […]

title: Nigerian Court Postpones Detained Binance Executive’s Tax Evasion Case to April 19
description: A Nigerian court has postponed the tax evasion case of the detained Binance executive to April 19, while the hearing for the cryptocurrency exchange itself is scheduled for April 8. The court also ordered that the executive Tigran Gambaryan be held in the custody of the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission. Tigran Gambaryan Accused of […]
